basic_information.scholarship_name: Wilfred and Faye McCombs Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.scholarship_notes: All funds to be awarded in student teaching semester.

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a degree in Teacher Education. Eligibility Requirements Teacher Education majors at UCO Must demonstrate strong intention to teach in OK Public Schools' system after graduation Must demonstrate a strong sense of integrity and moral character as deemed by department In a short essay, please share personal and professional examples of leadership experiences that demonstrate high moral character Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
